home.mainContentText: Hi, I'm Davronbek Reyimbaev. A passionate front-end developer based in Uzbekistan üéà Let's get to know each other ü§ù

about.mainDescText: I'm a junior frontend developer with a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I'm passionate about creating user-friendly and responsive web interfaces. I'm a quick learner and eager to contribute to a team environment, seeking opportunities to expand my experience. My toolbox is stocked with the modern technologies such as TypeScript, React, Vue, SASS. I have tried many tools and among them 'BEM' methodology, 'gulp.js' toolkit, 'ApexCharts.js' library are not my favorite ones. In addition to developing websites, I've had the opportunity to design several.
